pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription.

pathParameters.name: azureResourceName
pathParameters.description: The name of the powerbi resource.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.
